Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Actor.Boss.ParentBoss

Class BossProjectile

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.Actor.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.Actor.ActiveActorDestructible
com.example.demo.Actor.Projectile
com.example.demo.Actor.Boss.ParentBoss.BossProjectile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
Direct Known Subclasses:
MutationBossProjectile1, MutationBossProjectile2, MutationBossProjectile3
public class BossProjectile extends Projectile
The BossProjectile class represents a projectile fired by a boss in the game. It extends Projectile and moves horizontally and vertically at adjustable velocities.

  • Field Details

    • IMAGE_NAME

      private static final String IMAGE_NAME
      The image file name for the boss projectile.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • IMAGE_WIDTH

      private static final int IMAGE_WIDTH
      The width of the boss projectile image.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • IMAGE_HEIGHT

      private static final int IMAGE_HEIGHT
      The height of the boss projectile image.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • horizontalVelocity

      private double horizontalVelocity
      The horizontal velocity of the boss projectile. The default value is -7, which moves the projectile to the left.

    • verticalVelocity

      private double verticalVelocity
      The vertical velocity of the boss projectile. The default value is 0, which means no vertical movement.
